name: BRANE: Prototype
description:
BRANE™: Prototype is a short free innovative 2D indie puzzle game for Windows and Linux. With mind-bending particle mechanics and 16 challenging but fair levels, BRANE™ is guaranteed to at least temporarily make you forget that you will die.

"I love BRANE™ !"

~My girlfriend (that exists)

Features:

  • 16 levels
  • 2 kinds of particles
  • Will not teach you anything about real life physics
  • No pixelart
  • Retro-stylized graphics (but actually fake because no pixelart)
  • Two modes of manipulating objects: pushing and pulling (one more then your mom has)
  • Interesting gameplay with fun gimmicks
  • Erm, has an options menu I guess
  • Linux support (I know its literally in the first sentence but maybe you forgot by now)
  • Look, its a fine game. I did my best.
  • I refuse to add "music" to the list of features
